name: RED NIGHT
description:
New experience of Horror.
In RED NIGHT you will play Tess, a young policewoman, and face a terrible creature, as dangerous as it is fearful. She will chase you throughout the adventure.

Level
You'll be in a country house and you'll suffer power outages, the torch of your weapon will be your only ally against an enemy who will be more aggressive in the dark.
The m.ap consists of a large house, a basement and a laboratory. As the map is being created, it will get bigger during development.

Your mission :
will be to remove your assisted medical implant in a clandestine laboratory. You've got your service weapon, you're limited in ammo, and you are alone.

The Difficulty
The monster is not very resistant, but it is very fast and will be able to avoid you to get around and kill you. He may be frightened. Which will give you the advantage, for as long as it lasts
